adrenalStimulant.name: Adrenal Stimulant
adrenalStimulant.description: Bio-enhanced combat drug that increases attack speed by 10% <style=cStack>(+10% per stack)</style>.

exoLegAugmentation.name: Exo-Leg Augmentation
exoLegAugmentation.description: Cybernetic leg implants increase movement speed by 20% <style=cStack>(+20% per stack)</style>.

bioRegenerativeGel.name: Bio-Regenerative Gel
bioRegenerativeGel.description: Alien healing gel instantly restores 20 health when applied.

crystallineAmplifier.name: Crystalline Amplifier
crystallineAmplifier.description: Alien crystal formation that amplifies weapon damage by 15% <style=cStack>(+15% per stack)</style>.

cellularReinforcement.name: Cellular Reinforcement
cellularReinforcement.description: Nanite-enhanced tissue increases maximum health by 20 <style=cStack>(+20 per stack)</style>.

adaptiveChitin.name: Adaptive Chitin Plating
adaptiveChitin.description: Alien exoskeleton fragments that bond to armor, increasing defense by 2 <style=cStack>(+2 per stack)</style>.

plasmaDischargeCoil.name: Plasma Discharge Coil
plasmaDischargeCoil.description: Extracted from energy creatures - zaps nearby foes for 80% damage every 0.5s. Hits 2 <style=cStack>(+1 per stack)</style> additional targets.

neuralTargetingSystem.name: Neural Targeting System
neuralTargetingSystem.description: Brain-computer interface that increases critical strike chance by 10% <style=cStack>(+10% per stack)</style>.

naniteSwarm.name: Nanite Swarm
naniteSwarm.description: Microscopic repair bots increase health regeneration by 2 per second <style=cStack>(+2 per stack)</style>.

bioPlasmaSplitter.name: Bio-Plasma Splitter
bioPlasmaSplitter.description: Genetically engineered projectile system splits shots into 3 <style=cStack>(+1 projectile per stack)</style>.

parasiticSymbiote.name: Parasitic Symbiote
parasiticSymbiote.description: Bonds to user, healing for 15% of damage dealt to enemies <style=cStack>(+5% per stack)</style>.

quantumPhaseShifter.name: Quantum Phase Shifter
quantumPhaseShifter.description: Equipment: Phase through enemies, dealing 50 damage and gaining 0.5s invincibility. Press E to activate.

alienSporePod.name: Alien Spore Pod
alienSporePod.description: Equipment: Hurls explosive alien spores dealing 200 damage in a wide area. 10s cooldown. Press E to activate.

explosiveRounds.name: Explosive Rounds
explosiveRounds.description: Your attacks explode on impact, dealing 50% of your damage in a small area (+25% damage per stack).

lightningRod.name: Lightning Rod
lightningRod.description: Your attacks have a 25% chance to chain to 2 additional enemies, dealing 75% damage per chain (+1 target per stack).

infernoOrb.name: Inferno Orb
infernoOrb.description: Your attacks apply a burn that deals 10 fire damage per second for 3 seconds (+5 damage per stack).

frostShard.name: Frost Shard
frostShard.description: Your attacks apply a chill that slows enemies by 20% for 2 seconds and deals 5 ice damage (+10% slow per stack).

plasmaRicochetCore.name: Plasma Ricochet Core
plasmaRicochetCore.description: Your projectiles have a 25% chance to ricochet to nearby enemies for 50% damage (+10% chance per stack).

viralNanites.name: Viral Nanites
viralNanites.description: Dealing damage spreads a viral infection to nearby enemies for 30% of damage over 3 seconds (+10% spread per stack).

chronoAccelerator.name: Chrono Accelerator
chronoAccelerator.description: Reduces all cooldowns by 15% and increases attack speed by 8% (+5% cooldown reduction per stack).

gravitonWell.name: Graviton Well
gravitonWell.description: Creates a gravity well that pulls enemies toward your projectiles by 30% range (+5% pull strength per stack).

phasingCrystal.name: Phasing Crystal
phasingCrystal.description: Your projectiles penetrate through enemies and gain 20% damage per target hit (+10% damage per penetration).

adaptiveCamouflage.name: Adaptive Camouflage
adaptiveCamouflage.description: Reduces enemy detection range by 25% and increases critical chance by 8% (+3% crit chance per stack).

bioelectricField.name: Bio-Electric Field
bioelectricField.description: Every 3 seconds, chain lightning hits 3 nearby enemies for 25 damage (+8 damage per stack).

mutationSpores.name: Mutation Spores
mutationSpores.description: Enemies hit by your attacks have a 15% chance to mutate and fight for you for 5 seconds (+5% chance per stack).

stasisGrenade.name: Stasis Grenade
stasisGrenade.description: Equipment: Press E to freeze time in a 200px radius for 3 seconds. 45s cooldown.

phaseShifterBelt.name: Phase Shifter Belt
phaseShifterBelt.description: Equipment: Press E to teleport 300px in movement direction, gaining 2s invincibility. 20s cooldown.

sonicResonator.name: Sonic Resonator
sonicResonator.description: Equipment: Press E to emit a 400px sonic wave dealing 80 damage and stunning enemies 2s. 30s cooldown.

holographicDecoy.name: Holographic Decoy
holographicDecoy.description: Equipment: Press E to spawn a decoy that attracts enemies for 8 seconds. 35s cooldown.

energyShield.name: Energy Shield
energyShield.description: Equipment: Press E to create a shield blocking next 3 projectiles. 25s cooldown.

rageInducer.name: Rage Inducer
rageInducer.description: Equipment: Press E to double damage for 8 seconds but take 50% increased damage. 40s cooldown.

healingNanobots.name: Healing Nanobots
healingNanobots.description: Equipment: Press E to instantly heal 50 health and regenerate 10 health/second for 5 seconds. 60s cooldown.

shadowCloak.name: Shadow Cloak
shadowCloak.description: Equipment: Press E to become invisible for 4 seconds, next attack deals 3x damage. 50s cooldown.

timeDuplicator.name: Time Duplicator
timeDuplicator.description: Equipment: Press E to create time clone of yourself that mimics attacks for 6 seconds. 90s cooldown.

venomGlands.name: Venom Glands
venomGlands.description: Bio-engineered poison glands. Hits apply poison dealing 5 damage per second for 8 seconds <style=cStack>(Poison stacks)</style>.

napalmCanister.name: Napalm Canister
napalmCanister.description: Incendiary weapon. Hits apply fire dealing 8 damage per second for 6 seconds <style=cStack>(Fire stacks)</style>.

plasmaExplosives.name: Plasma Explosives
plasmaExplosives.description: Explosive plasma rounds. Critical hits cause AoE explosion for 60 damage in 120px radius.

soulHarvester.name: Soul Harvester
soulHarvester.description: Dark energy weapon. Killing enemies restores 15 health and increases damage by 5% for 10 seconds <style=cStack>(Stacks duration)</style>.

chainLightningCore.name: Chain Lightning Core
chainLightningCore.description: Advanced energy core. Hits have 25% chance to chain to 3 additional enemies for 40% damage.

corrosiveAcid.name: Corrosive Acid
corrosiveAcid.description: Powerful acid that melts armor. Hits reduce enemy armor by 5 for 10 seconds <style=cStack>(Stacks)</style>.

berserkerSerum.name: Berserker Serum
berserkerSerum.description: Combat stimulant. Killing enemies grants 20% attack speed and 30% move speed for 5 seconds <style=cStack>(Stacks duration)</style>.

deathMark.name: Death Mark
deathMark.description: Cursed marking ability. Hits mark enemies for death - they take 50% increased damage from all sources for 8 seconds.

vampireFangs.name: Vampire Fangs
vampireFangs.description: Bio-enhanced fangs. Hits heal for 25% of damage dealt <style=cStack>(+5% healing per stack)</style>.

frostShard.name: Frost Shard
frostShard.description: Cryo weapon that slows enemies by 30% and deals 3 damage per second for 5 seconds.

mutationEngine.name: Mutation Engine
mutationEngine.description: Experimental device. Kills have 10% chance to spawn allied mutations that fight for you for 15 seconds.

doomsdayDevice.name: Doomsday Device
doomsdayDevice.description: Equipment: Press E to detonate massive explosion dealing 500 damage in 300px radius. 120s cooldown.

phoenixFeather.name: Phoenix Feather
phoenixFeather.description: Legendary artifact. When health drops below 25%, instantly revive to full health and gain 100% damage for 10 seconds. 180s cooldown.

hivemindCoordinator.name: Hivemind Coordinator
hivemindCoordinator.description: Psionic amplifier. Killing enemies causes all other enemies within 200px to take 30 damage.

darkMatterCondenser.name: Dark Matter Condenser
darkMatterCondenser.description: Exotic physics device. Every 5th hit deals 5x damage and creates a gravity well pulling enemies for 3 seconds.
